message: For quite some time, it seems that it would be pretty easy to find multiple topics on the same issue. It seems that nobody is bothered to do a search before hosting a new topic. This may require some sort of machine learning facilities and existing examples include Google Help Forum, where you ask a question, they polls some existing questions to aid your decision.

Actually just wonder, if anyone here knows what kind of existing technology/algorithm is dealing with this kind of problem? it would be useful for the developers to save some time on researching the problem.
